Get the last year of commit activity

Returns the last year of commit activity grouped by week. The days array is a group of commits per day, starting on Sunday.

GET /repos/:owner/:repo/stats/commit_activity

Response

Status: 200 OK

[
  {
    "days": [
      0,
      3,
      26,
      20,
      39,
      1,
      0
    ],
    "total": 89,
    "week": 1336280400
  }
]
